room_title: Escape room "The Ultimate Heist" by Clue Chase in New York
review: Nine of us did The Ultimate Heist as a part of birthday celebration. The game has enough riddles for everyone to be occupied. It was fun! Thank you.

room_title: Escape room "The Ultimate Heist" by Clue Chase in New York
review: Had a great time here on a Friday. We did the "Ultimate Heist" and it was manageable with 8 but pleasantly difficult. Lots of spatial and word puzzles. Would have enjoyed a bit more logic-oriented puzzle solving, but it's overall a fun bonding experience that I'd recommend.

room_title: Escape room "The Ultimate Heist" by Clue Chase in New York
review: 9 of us did The Ultimate Heist as a part of birthday celebration. The game has enough riddles for everyone to be occupied. It was fun!

room_title: Escape room "The Ultimate Heist" by Clue Chase in New York
review: We had so much fun doing The Ultimate Heist with Clue Lou, even though we were just short of making it out I loved it and would definitely return if/when I find myself in New York again!

room_title: Escape room "The Ultimate Heist" by Clue Chase in New York
review: We had a blast! Our host, "Vinnie" made the game a lot of fun and he couldn't of been better with his impersonation of a jewelry heist boss! It was our first time playing and we were teamed up with our friend, Diana from Romania and 6 people from France. Great time and teamwork!

room_title: Escape room "The Ultimate Heist" by Clue Chase in New York
review: We did the Ultimate Heist one, and we had a blast! Thoughtful and challenging, really stretched your way of thinking. I feel like 1 hour isn't long enough because it's so fun! Would definitely recommend anyone out with a group of friends looking for an interactive experience.
